channel.title: Innovations Radio
channel.description: The internet radio show dedicated to helping you look and feel your best. Topics discussed include plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, naturopathic medicine, health, wellness, alternative medicine, hair loss, hair restoration, facial plastic surgery, and exercise.
channel.itunes:summary: The internet radio show dedicated to helping you look and feel your best. Topics discussed include plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, naturopathic medicine, health, wellness, alternative medicine, hair loss, hair restoration, facial plastic surgery, and exercise.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Internet Radio with Dr. D.J. Verret
channel.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD

item.title: D.J. Verret, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mail and reviews the top 10 plastic surgery advances of the 21st century.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. D.J. Verret answers listener e-mail including information about dermabrasion versus microdermabrasion, the best laser for wrinkles,
item.description: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mail and reviews the top 10 plastic surgery advances of the 21st century.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD

item.title: Daniel Rousso, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Daniel Rousso talks with Dr. Verret about the American Academy of Facial Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery (AAFPRS).
item.itunes:summary: Dr. D.J. Verret interviews Dr. Daniel Rousso, current president of the American Academy of Facial Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery (AAFPRS). Dr. Rousso discusses the Academy, its mission, and several humanitarian programs which are being promoted including the Face to Face program for international outreach and national domestic violence assistance and the Faces of Honor program to help veterans of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars who have sustained facial injuries. Dr. Rousso also discusses requirements for facial plastic surgeons who wish to be certified by the American Board of Facial Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery (ABFPRS) and the differences between the two organizations.
item.description: Dr. Daniel Rousso talks with Dr. Verret about the American Academy of Facial Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery (AAFPRS).
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, Rousso, ABFPRS, AAFPRS

item.title: Ronald Friedman, MD Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Friedman shares his experience with breast augmentation surgery and answers patient questions about plastic surgery.

item.description: Dr. Friedman shares his experience with breast augmentation surgery and answers patient questions about plastic surgery.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)

item.itunes:keywords: plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, breast augmentation, breast implant, mommy makeover

item.title: D.J. Verret, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails about hair loss, hair transplant surgery, facelift longevity, and board certification.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails. Included in today's batch of e-mails are questions about treatments for hair loss, the difference between follicular unit grafting and follicular unit extraction for hair transplant surgery, the longevity of facelift surgery, and what it means to be board certified.
item.description: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails about hair loss, hair transplant surgery, facelift longevity, and board certification.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, facelift, hair transplant, hair loss, board certification

item.title: Kimberly Wilson, NMD Naturopathic Doctor
item.itunes:subtitle: Staying healthy and happy for the holidays.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Verret interviews Dr. Wilson on ways to stay healthy for the holidays, tips for eating and not gaining weight, and how to make New Years resolutions that you can stick to.
item.description: Staying healthy and happy for the holidays.

item.title: Robert Adelson, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Adelson discusses functional rhinoplasty, septorhinoplasty surgery, and septoplasty surgery with Dr. Verret.
item.itunes:summary: Facial plastic surgeon from the University of Florida, Dr. Robert Adelson, joins Dr. Verret for a discussion of functional rhinoplasty surgery. Included is an explanation of the types of rhinoplasty, the difference between rhinoplasty and septoplasty, and some of the approaches used to perform rhinoplasty surgery.
item.description: Dr. Adelson discusses functional rhinoplasty, septorhinoplasty surgery, and septoplasty surgery with Dr. Verret.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: rhinoplasty,septoplasty,functional rhinoplasty,nasal obstruction,runny nose,breathing problems,,functional rhinoplasty explained

item.title: Jim Gilmore, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret interviews facial plastic surgeon Dr. Jim Gimore on facial implants.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Verret interviews Dr. Jim Gilmore about his experience in facial plastic surgery and facial implants. Included are discussions of cheek implants, lip implants, and facial fillers.
item.description: Dr. Verret interviews facial plastic surgeon Dr. Jim Gimore on facial implants.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: dermal filler, facial implants, lip implant, lip augmentation, cosmetic surgery

item.title: Keith LaFerriere, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret interviews facial plastic surgeon Dr. Keith LaFerrire about facelift (rhytidectomy) surgery.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Keith LaFerriere, Springfield, MO facial plastic surgeon joins Dr. D.J. Verret for a discussion of facelift (rhytidectomy) procedures. The discussion includes information about mini face lift procedures, more extensive SMAS facelifts, neck lifts, neck liposuction, and newer techniques in facial rejuvenation. For more information about Dr. LaFerriere, visit his web site at http://www.facialplasticsurgeon.com.
item.description: Dr. Verret interviews facial plastic surgeon Dr. Keith LaFerrire about facelift (rhytidectomy) surgery.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: facelift, face lift, facial rejuvenation, facial plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery

item.title: D.J. Verret, MD Facial Plastic Surgeon
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails on facial plastic surgery topics.
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails on a variety of topics including: facial resurfacing lasers, acne scar treatment, hair cloning, facelifts, blepharoplasty (eyelid surgery), and non-surgical rhinoplasty.
item.description: Dr. Verret answers listener e-mails on facial plastic surgery topics.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: plastic surgery, cosmetic surgery, facelift, medicine, laser

item.title: Kimberly Wilson, NMD Naturopathic Doctor
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Verret interviews naturopathic doctor Kimberly Wilson about health and wellness.
item.itunes:summary: For more information about Dr. Wilson, visit her web site at http://innovationswellness.com. Dr. Wilson discusses naturopathic medicine and the training for naturopathic doctors. She also talks about diet modifications, supplements, and ways that you can survive the flu season.
item.description: Dr. Verret interviews naturopathic doctor Kimberly Wilson about health and wellness.
item.author: radio@innovationsfps.com (D.J. Verret, MD)
item.itunes:author: D.J. Verret, MD
item.itunes:keywords: naturopathic medicine, flu treatment, flu prevention, supplements, diet
